Objective I am seeking a cooperative position in the field of advertising to gain experience and demonstrate the skills I have learned through previous job experience and formal education Experience
Model at Maggie Inc. April 2013–Present Boston, MA Work with international brands in the Greater Boston area for e-commerce use. Work closely with photographers, fashion coordinators, directors, producers, stylists, makeup artists, other models, and clients to produce the desired looks, and to finish photo shoots on schedule.
Receptionist at Turnstyle Cycle Studios April 2016–Present Boston, MA Check in customers and assist with bike set-up Create a warm and welcoming environment for customers
Caller at University of San Diego Telefunding September 2015–December 2015 Utilized effective sales skills to raise money in the form of donations to USD. Brought in 15 new donors within 3 months. Raised a total of $7215.00 as of December 1st, 2015.
Education Northeastern University 2019 Communication Studies Anticipated Minors in Media Production and Business Anticipated

Extracurricular Surfrider Foundation member. Participate in beach cleanups & fundraising events. July 2015- Present.
